graph_title: Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions

SDG_GOAL: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_TARGET: Target 1.2: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
